text: Ezɨ uaghan Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Egha bizir kam bagha God an diazir dughiamɨn, Abraham Godɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua, egha uan nguibam ataki. Egha a nguibar God a danɨngasa akam akɨrɨzimɨn ghu, kar guizɨn an nguibamra. Ezɨ Abraham fozir puvatɨ, a managh mangam. Egha a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikia egha a zui.
